page.title: 14THE ARTS.
page.content: {People and the Arts in Our Area. Only 2 percent of people surveyed go to Bingo sessions regularly.Few people were members of theatrical companies but 36 percent said they like going to see plays.Concerts proved popular with 48 percent stating they regularly attend.Most popular was the cinema,two thirds of those surveyed go about 4 times a year.Many visit Art Galleries and Exhibitions (56%)but only 12% belong to a Cultural Society.People hardly ever attend poetry reading or literture classes,8% stated their hobbies included writing and only 6% included painting.Half of those surveyed regularly attend the local libraries making 1 or 2 visits a month.The most popular author was Catherine Cookson who wrote romantic novels with a historical element.There was no clear cut favourite book.
